name: Leave the program
text message:
If you do not want to receive any more messages, please type "STOP MESSAGES."
If you made a mistake, please type "back" and choose another option.

name: Leave the program
text message:
Thank you so much for participating in the programme! If you want to return to the programme, type "START_MESSAGES". 

We hope to see you again soon, and we wish you a happy and peaceful day!
name of flow: PLH - Help - Settings - Leave the program

name: Leave the program
